line.text: Was it the proud full sail of his great verse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Bound for the prize of (all too precious) you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That did my ripe thoughts in my brain inhearse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Making their tomb the womb wherein they grew
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Was it his spirit by spirits taught to write
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Above a mortal pitch that struck me dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No neither he nor his compeers by night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Giving him aid my verse astonished
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: He nor that affable familiar ghost
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which nightly gulls him with intelligence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As victors of my silence cannot boast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I was not sick of any fear from thence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But when your countenance filled up his line
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then lacked I matter that enfeebled mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
